channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Garden Chairs, 27th August
item.description:
Garden chairs dumped on embankment near bus stop and adjacent to vet surgery in Oarish Lane

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parish Lane, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping from local businesses, 27th August
item.description:
This has not been cleaned for almost 3 weeks and more waste is being added daily. Can something please be done about the continuous illegal dumping.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rivington Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Accident related road work barriers, 27th August
item.description:
Please be advised that my daughter tripped up these road work barriers today hurting her leg. They have been left here for a number of months and are a hazard. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, South Hill Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Double mattress dumped next to South Rise Primary School/opposite Majendie Road, 27th August
item.description:
A double mattress has been dumped/placed up against the wall (South Rise Primary School) on Brewery Road/opposite Majendie Road. There is also the base of a double bed dumped at the beginning of Majendie Road. Majendie Road is fast becoming a hot spot for fly tipping!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brewery Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very broken pavement, 27th August
item.description:
This pavement had been in a shocking state for at least 3 years. It’s a major access route to a primary school, a trip hazard, gets very muddy and boggy in winter - making it harder to see the trip hazards Myself and others have reported it numerous times, fix it before someone gets hurt. The playground is full of drug bits, rubbish, fly tipping. It’s disgusting

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartington Road, Vauxhall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of rubbish fly tipped again, 27th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Hallowes, Mottingham, London

item.title: Broken paving slab, 27th August
item.description:
Broken paving slab. I already tripped in it falling face down, body slamming the pavement. Tef 5183/5184 I reported this last January so maybe fix it before someone gets hurt
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Binfield Road, Stockwell, London
